text: yathAq vai sa#mRutasOqmA EqvaM ~MvA EqtE sa#mRutayaqj~jA yadda#r.SapUrNamAqsau kasyaq vA&ha# dEqvA yaqj~jamAqgacCa#ntiq kasya# vAq na ba#hUqnAM ~Myaja#mAnAnAqM ~MyO vai dEqvatAqH pUrva#H parigRuqhNAtiq sa E#nAqH SvO BUqtE ya#jata Eqtadvai dEqvAnA#mAqyata#naqM ~MyadA#havaqnIyO$&ntaqrA&gnI pa#SUqnAM gAr.ha#patyO manuqShyA#NA-manvAhAryaqpaca#naH pitRuqNAmaqgniM gRu#hNAtiq sva EqvAyata#nE dEqvatAqH pari# - [  ] 21
